title: My Then and Your Now
description: Adriana Austin is a strong-willed woman but the past is keeping her hostage. After her sister’s death, her family falls apart. She puts a mask of ignorance on her face, constantly repeating that everything is fine.The mask crack at the moment Neal Cassidy steps foot in town as the new major shareholder of her father’s business. Seven years ago, Adriana publicly blamed Neal for her sister’s death and made him run away. He is here now, seeking revenge and Adriana has no other option but to fight back.The hardest battle turns out to be the one you have with yourself.One war. Two rivals. Will there be a winner at all?
author: Jordan Stella
